Bash(gh issue create --title "fix\(ci\): Dependabot PR linked issue check fails after branch update" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Problem

When a Dependabot PR branch is updated \(e.g., via `gh pr update-branch`\), the CI workflow''s linked issue check fails because it was checking `context.actor` instead of the PR author or branch name.

The `context.actor` changes to whoever triggered the branch update, causing the Dependabot exemption to not apply.

## Solution

Check both `context.payload.pull_request.user.login` \(PR author\) and `context.payload.pull_request.head.ref` \(branch name\) to properly exempt Dependabot PRs regardless of who updates the branch.
EOF
\)")
